question.text: Which of the following function or activity is not affected by smooth muscles in human?

options.text: Transportation of food through the digestive tract
Transport of gametes through the genital duct
Transportation of urine through the ureter and bladder
Chewing and swallowing of food through buccal cavity.

solution.text: Transportation of food by peristalsis through the digestive tract, transport of gametes through genital tract and transportation of urine through ureter and ureter is mainly controlled by contraction and relaxation of non-striated smooth muscles. Chewing and swelling of food involves striated and skeletal voluntary muscles.
